name: DataStarGetSources
description: Gets the source files specified in the manifest file and writes them to disk so that they can be used as part of the build.
author: Absolute Technology Limited
releaseNotes: The task writes the files specified in the manifest to disk so that they can be used as part of the build

inputs.name: ManifestPath
inputs.label: Manifest Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The $ prefixed version control path to the file or folder containing the manifest files.

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target directory for the source files.

inputs.name: FailOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

inputs.name: CleanSourceDirectory
inputs.label: Clean Source Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will delete existing files from the source directory.

inputs.name: RepositoryUri
inputs.label: TFS Repository Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The TFS Server Url (defaults to the BUILD_REPOSITORY_URI)

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional username if not using default credentials

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional password if not using default credentials. **Use a Variable to encrypt the Password.**
